TextView.android:text:
HIGH LEVEL TEAM STATS:

Click on a team to see detailed positional breakdowns. Click and hold to see the best lineup this team can field
Note: This is based on your roster settings. During the preseason, this is overall, but during the season it's per week.
PLAYERS LIST:\n\nClick on a name to see more, or use the below dropdowns to filter. If not sorted in a custom way, projections are listed by names.
WHO TO START:\n\nThere are two input fields. Input a player into each, and the table below will fill out, showing how each player compares to the other.

HIGH LEVEL LEAGUE STATS:\n\nFor positional breakdowns, teams are sorted by projections from the starters at a position, with points above average for those starters listed and for all at the position in parentheses. Click on one of the elements to see a graphical representation. If it's a positional breakdown, a single click will show starters and a long click the whole set.
